attributes.action: Provide ACCESS TO JUSTICE for all citizens of the UK and NOT just the millionaires or the very few who can still obtain Legal Aid or Conditional Fee Agreements
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By completely dismantling our current CIVIL LEGAL SYSTEM and starting again or by providing the alternative, in other E-Petitions to ALL, regardless of status or income.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
